TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConformanceLevel extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the amount of input or output checking that and objects perform.

span.span: Specifies the amount of input or output checking that and objects perform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML リーダーまたはライター インスタンスを作成するときに使用できます、またはクラスをサポートするために新しいインスタンスを必要な機能を指定します。When you create an XML reader or writer instance, you can use the or class to specify the features that you want the new instance to support. 構成できる機能の 1 つは、XML データに適用する準拠のレベルです。One of the features that you can configure is the level of conformance you want to enforce on the XML data. 準拠しているリーダーまたはライターを作成するには、処理されている XML データが、指定した準拠のレベルに準拠しているが保証されます。Creating a compliant reader or writer guarantees that the XML data being processed complies with the specified conformance level. 読み取りし、書き込みストリームに準拠レベルに準拠していない場合、例外がスローされます。If the stream being read or written doesn't comply with the conformance level, an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.ConformanceLevel Auto = int32(0)

summary.span: The or object automatically detects whether document-level or fragment-level checking should be performed, and does the appropriate checking.

span.span: The or object automatically detects whether document-level or fragment-level checking should be performed, and does the appropriate checking.

summary.span: If you're wrapping another or object, the outer object doesn't do any additional conformance checking.

span.span: If you're wrapping another or object, the outer object doesn't do any additional conformance checking.

summary.span: Conformance checking is left up to the underlying object.

span.span: Conformance checking is left up to the underlying object.

summary.span: See the and properties for details on how the compliance level is determined.

span.span: See the and properties for details on how the compliance level is determined.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.ConformanceLevel Document = int32(2)

summary.span: The XML data complies with the rules for a well-formed [XML 1.0 document](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed), as defined by the W3C.

span.span: The XML data complies with the rules for a well-formed [XML 1.0 document](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed), as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このレベルのチェックにより、読み取りし、書き込みストリームとしてすべてのプロセッサで使用できること、 [XML 1.0 ドキュメント](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed)します。This level of checking ensures that the stream being read or written can be consumed by any processor as an [XML 1.0 document](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed). ドキュメント レベルのチェックは、フラグメント レベルのチェックを適用しても、次を確認します。Document-level checks enforce fragment-level checks and also ensure the following: - 最上位の項目は、XML 宣言、DTD、要素、コメント、空白文字、または処理命令以外のノードにありません。The top-level item doesn't have any nodes other than the XML declaration, DTD, element, comment, white space, or processing instruction. - XML データでは、1 つだけの最上位の要素ノードがあります。The XML data has one and only one top-level element node.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xml.ConformanceLevel Fragment = int32(1)

summary.span: The XML data is a [well-formed XML fragment](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities), as defined by the W3C.

span.span: The XML data is a [well-formed XML fragment](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities), as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks この準拠レベルは、ルート要素をいない可能性がありますが、適切な形式では、それ以外の場合、XML ドキュメントを表します。This conformance level represents an XML document that might not have a root element but is otherwise well-formed. このレベルのチェックにより、読み取りし、書き込みストリームとしてすべてのプロセッサで使用できること、 [XML 1.0 の外部解析エンティティ](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities)します。This level of checking ensures that the stream being read or written can be consumed by any processor as an [XML 1.0 external parsed entity](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities).
